Define Documentation

#define SDH_ASSERT_TYPESIZES ( )
Value:
do {                                    \
        assert( sizeof( Int8 )   == 1 );    \
        assert( sizeof( UInt8 )  == 1 );    \
        assert( sizeof( Int16 )  == 2 );    \
        assert( sizeof( UInt16 ) == 2 );    \
        assert( sizeof( Int32 )  == 4 );    \
        assert( sizeof( UInt32 ) == 4 );    \
    } while (0)
